ch.codebulb.crudfaces.controller

Class SimpleCrudController<T extends CrudIdentifiable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.codebulb.crudfaces.controller.SimpleCrudController<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrudTableController

    public abstract class SimpleCrudController<T extends CrudIdentifiable>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Basic implementation of a CRUD controller.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Nicolas Hofstetter (codebulb.ch)
    See Also:

      • delete

        public String delete()
        Deletes the entity with the id held by GET parameter deleteId from the service and redirects to the master view. A workaround for use with @RequestScoped controller only.
